alert.note: Alert for Cameron (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 21 at 8:21PM CDT until further notice by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of Deep South Texas, including the following counties, Cameron and Hidalgo. * WHEN...Until 845 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 819 PM CDT, Local law enforcement reported street flooding in Mercedes. The threat of urban and small stream flooding continues. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Harlingen, Mercedes, La Feria, Santa Maria, Santa Maria High School, Relampago, Mercedes Junior High School, Ruben Hinojosa Elementary School, Mercedes High School, La Feria Public Library, La Feria Police Department, Mercedes Memorial Library, Mercedes Police Department, Taylor Elementary School, Llano Grande Country Club, South Texas High School For Health Professions, Las Rusias, Mcallen, Bixby and La Feria Reservoir. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
